title: Arthur Hayes tells Zcash holders to withdraw from CEXs and ‘shield’ assets
summary: Hayes’ call to self-custody Zcash highlights renewed focus on privacy coins as the sector sees sharp price swings and mixed performances.

title: Coinbase Business launches in Singapore to reshape payments with USDC
summary: Expanding outside the US, Coinbase Business launches in Singapore to give startups and SMEs a unified platform for USDC payments, asset management and more.

title: Visa pilots fiat-funded stablecoin payouts for US businesses
summary: Visa is piloting a service allowing US dollar stablecoin payouts to crypto wallets from business accounts funded with fiat currency.

title: Morgan Stanley says it’s harvest time as Bitcoin enters ‘fall’ season
summary: Morgan Stanley’s Denny Galindo likens Bitcoin’s cycle to the seasons, warning that the market’s “fall” phase is a time to secure gains before a downturn.

title: UAE’s ‘digital dirham’ CBDC pilot completes first transaction
summary: The United Arab Emirates' central bank digital currency pilot has made its first transaction, reportedly completed in under two minutes.

title: Bitwise Chainlink ETF appears on DTCC site, tipping pending launch
summary: Bitwise’s spot Chainlink ETF has appeared on the Depository Trust and Clearing Corporation’s registry, a sign that it could launch in the near future.

title: Nationally chartered bank SoFi rolls out crypto trading for US customers
summary: SoFi CEO Anthony Noto says the bank also plans to introduce a stablecoin called SoFi USD and views blockchain and crypto as a “super cycle technology.”

title: Canary Capital filing signals spot XRP ETF set for launch this week
summary: Canary Capital’s XRP ETF is set to be the first US-based fund to directly hold the token, following the company’s key SEC filing that could see it launch on Thursday.

title: Bank of England’s Breeden warns watered-down stablecoin rules risk stability
summary: Breeden said loosening UK stablecoin rules could fuel risky bank outflows, urging stronger safeguards as the Bank of England finalizes its crypto framework.

title: Sorry, Moonvember hopefuls, macro uncertainty signals sideways month
summary: Bitfinex says macro conditions signal consolidation, but others are optimistic that Bitcoin will gain as usual in November.
